name: NATIONAL TRUST COMMUNITY INVESTMENT CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Educate Congress on how the national interest is served by IRC Section 47 which provides incentives for real estate developers to rehabilitate certified historic properties. We also discuss HR 1158 an
